sys_remote_update_set.description:
This Update Set contains the Changes to the Email Notifications which gets triggered when 1. State changes for RITM 2. Stage changes for RITM 3. State changes for Change Request
Also, it triggers email notification for any Pending Approvals in the approvers queue for more than 24 hours.
sys_remote_update_set.name: GD - STRY0011220 - Enable_repeating_notifications_for_approval
